mapper.select: SELECT AA.seq , AA.thumbnail , AA.kind , AA.kind_detail AS kindDetail , AA.birth , AA.gender , AA.neuter AA.notice_end AS noticeEnd , MAX(AA.reservation) AS isReserve FROM ( SELECT AP.seq , AP.thumbnail , AP.kind , AP.kind_detail , AP.birth , AP.gender , AP.neuter , AP.notice_end , true AS reservation FROM abandoned_pet AP INNER JOIN shelter S ON S.seq = AP.shelter_seq INNER JOIN adopt A ON A.user_seq = #{userSeq} AND AP.seq = A.pet_Seq AND A.state = '예약' UNION ALL SELECT AP.seq , AP.thumbnail , AP.kind , AP.kind_detail , AP.birth , AP.gender , AP.neuter , AP.notice_end , false AS reservation FROM abandoned_pet AP INNER JOIN shelter S ON S.seq = AP.shelter_seq INNER JOIN pin_up P ON P.user_seq = #{userSeq} AND AP.seq = P.pet_seq ) AA GROUP BY AA.seq, AA.thumbnail, AA.kind, AA.kind_detail, AA.birth, AA.gender, AA.neuter, AA.notice_end;
